sheet_title: Erosion Control & Construction Activity Best Management Practices
prepared_by: City of Long Beach — Building and Safety Bureau (Information Bulletins BU-039 & BU-038)
description: City of Long Beach standard erosion control and construction activity best management practices (BMPs). Contains Information Bulletin BU-039 (erosion control: scheduling, preservation of vegetation, stabilized construction entrance, silt fence, sand bag barrier) and BU-038 (construction activity: water conservation, material delivery/storage, material use, spill prevention, solid/hazardous/concrete waste management, vehicle/equipment cleaning and fueling). Standard city-issued reference sheet, not project-specific engineering.
key_content: BU-039 Erosion Control BMPs: BM01 Scheduling, BM02 Preservation of Existing Vegetation, BM03A Stabilized Construction Entrance (20 ft min width, 50 ft min length), BM03C Silt Fence (85% soil retention), BM03E Sand Bag Barrier

BU-038 Construction Activity BMPs: CA02 Water Conservation, CA10 Material Delivery and Storage, CA11 Material Use, CA52 Spill Prevention and Control, CA53 Solid Waste Management, CA54 Hazardous Waste Management, CA55 Vehicle and Equipment Cleaning, CA56/CA59 Vehicle and Equipment Fueling, CA57 Concrete Waste Management
Standard City of Long Beach information bulletins — not project-specific calculations
